column2: Performance Shipping, Inc. engages in the provision of shipping transportation services through its ownership of containerships. The company is headquartered in Athina, Attiki and currently employs 256 full-time employees. The Company, through its subsidiaries, is engaged in the ownership of containerships and it is focused on providing sourcing opportunities for vessel purchases and sales, newbuilding acquisitions, chartering and financing arrangements. Its vessels are employed primarily on time charters with leading liner companies carrying containerized cargo along worldwide shipping routes. The company owns and operates four container vessels 2 Post-Panamax and 2 Panamax, and its fleet includes Pamina, Domingo, Rotterdam and Pucon. The firm's customers include national, regional and international companies.
